skill.name: compliance-checker
skill.description: Check code against security compliance standards and best practices.
skill.summary: Check code against security compliance standards and best practices.
skill.author: CuriousLearner

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. Contains security compliance guidance, checklists, and code examples for analysis only. No network access, filesystem access, script execution, or external commands detected.

content.value_statement: Developers need to verify their code meets security and regulatory standards. This skill checks code against OWASP Top 10, PCI-DSS, HIPAA, GDPR, and other frameworks with actionable compliance reports.
actual_capabilities: Check code against OWASP Top 10 security vulnerabilities
Validate compliance with PCI-DSS, HIPAA, GDPR, SOC 2 standards
Detect SQL injection, XSS, authentication flaws, and other vulnerabilities
Generate comprehensive compliance assessment reports with gap analysis
Provide code examples showing violations and compliant implementations
Apply CWE Top 25 and NIST Cybersecurity Framework checks
limitations: Does not execute code or scan files directly
Does not modify code or fix vulnerabilities automatically
Does not access external APIs or databases
Relies on user-provided code snippets for analysis

use_cases.title: Pre-release security review
use_cases.description: Verify code meets security standards before deployment to production environments.

use_cases.title: Compliance audit support
use_cases.description: Prepare evidence and checklists for regulatory compliance audits and certifications.

use_cases.title: CI/CD security gates
use_cases.description: Integrate security compliance checks into development workflows and pipelines.

prompt_templates.title: Basic compliance check
prompt_templates.prompt: Check this code for security compliance issues related to OWASP Top 10: [paste code here]

prompt_templates.title: Framework-specific audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Validate this code for [PCI-DSS|HIPAA|GDPR|SOC 2] compliance. List any violations and required fixes.

prompt_templates.title: Generate compliance report
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a comprehensive compliance report for this codebase against OWASP Top 10, HIPAA, and GDPR standards.

prompt_templates.title: Remediation guidance
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze these compliance violations and provide step-by-step remediation guidance with code examples.

output_examples.input: Check this code for SQL injection vulnerabilities: const query = `SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = '${email}'`;
output: The code uses string interpolation to build SQL queries, allowing attackers to manipulate input.
Compliant code: const query = 'SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = ?'; db.query(query, [email]);

best_practices: Provide complete code snippets including function context for accurate analysis
Specify which compliance frameworks are relevant to your use case
Review generated reports before applying fixes to understand context
Combine automated checks with manual security code reviews for comprehensive coverage
anti_patterns: Submitting incomplete code fragments without proper context
Expecting the skill to automatically fix vulnerabilities in your codebase
Using compliance checks as a replacement for penetration testing
Ignoring warnings about sensitive data in logs or error messages

faq.question: What compliance standards does this skill support?
faq.answer: Supports OWASP Top 10, PCI-DSS, HIPAA, GDPR, SOC 2, CWE Top 25, SANS Top 25, NIST CSF, ISO 27001, CCPA, and FERPA.

faq.question: Can this skill scan my entire codebase at once?
faq.answer: The skill analyzes code snippets you provide. For large codebases, submit key files or functions separately for targeted analysis.

faq.question: Does this skill integrate with CI/CD pipelines?
faq.answer: The skill itself does not integrate directly. Use compliance reports as documentation for pipeline security gates and audit trails.

faq.question: Is my code data sent to external servers?
faq.answer: No. This is a prompt-based skill. Code analysis happens within your AI session and is not transmitted externally.

faq.question: What should I do when violations are found?
faq.answer: Review the severity, understand the vulnerability, apply the suggested fix, and re-run the check to verify the remediation.

faq.question: How does this compare to static analysis tools?
faq.answer: This skill provides contextual guidance and compliance mapping. Use with SAST tools like SonarQube or Snyk for automated scanning.
